title: MD
biography: Ashok Jhunjhunwala is an Indian academic and innovator. He received his B.Tech. from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur and PhD from the University of Maine. He has been a faculty member at the Indian Institute of Technology Madras since 1981. He is the President of IIT Madras Research Park and Chairman of International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad. During his career, he has contributed extensively to technology innovation and adoption in the Indian context.
aiSummary: Ashok Jhunjhunwala is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 29 at Telemedicine systems (Member). Has been published in Lecture notes in computer science, Chemical science, Teletraffic science and engineering. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
